meanings.definition: A type of alcoholic beverage made from the fermented juice of the agave plant.
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed sipping on tequilas.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a variety of tequilas to the customers.
meanings.sent3: The tequilas danced in the glasses, tempting everyone to take a sip.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of tequilas filled the room, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The tequilas sparkled in the sunlight, enticing passersby to try a taste.

meanings.definition: Plural form of tequila, referring to multiple bottles or servings of the drink.
meanings.sent1: The store stocked various tequilas for the weekend party.
meanings.sent2: She bought three tequilas for the gathering with friends.
meanings.sent3: The tequilas lined up on the shelf, ready to be enjoyed by guests.
meanings.sent4: The tequilas on the table whispered tales of fun nights and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The collection of tequilas gleamed under the lights, promising a good time ahead.
